title: 游戏崩溃，数组越界
author: 戏志才
txt_content:
本帖最后由 SPGoding 于 2020-1-31 11:24 编辑 

求大佬看看出错在哪
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// I blame Dinnerbone.

Time: 20-1-30 下午8:39
Description: Unexpected error

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
戏志才 发表于 2020-1-30 22:16
这是更新fastcraft后的错误报告This issue is caused by placing Edged Stone at y=0 or y=255.
Client crash while trying to get neighbor block to render connected edge or not.
Reproduced with ExtraUtilities 1.2.12
https://github.com/rwtema/extrau ... uecomment-221932320

有点无语，你先删掉更多实用设备Mod，并且在存档内在原本是更多实用设备方块的地方塞上其他方块，然后把Mod加回去试试。

replies.author: 戏志才
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-1-30 21:56
更新 FastCraft 至 1.25
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-343542-1-1.html
兄弟，我装上后彻底进不了游戏了，之前还是进图时才崩

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
戏志才 发表于 2020-1-30 22:05
兄弟，我装上后彻底进不了游戏了，之前还是进图时才崩
更新当然要把老版本的给删了。

删除新的崩溃报告

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
戏志才 发表于 2020-1-30 22:05
兄弟，我装上后彻底进不了游戏了，之前还是进图时才崩
发一下新生成的崩溃报告，注意把长文本用spoiler折叠一下

replies.author: 戏志才
replies.txt_content:

ItIsEnderman 发表于 2020-1-30 22:31
https://github.com/rwtema/extrautilities_old_issues/issues/656#issuecomment-221932320
